name: Rocky Towers: Puzzle Defense
summary: Alright, so, no pressure but… without your help, the Light is doomed. The Void has been chasing us for the last few centuries, but the situation is dire. Only a few of us Ligthspawn remain, and we ask your help now! In order to evacuate the towers, we will need you to remove bricks to create a safe passage for the young Lightspawn. Defend them against the Void! Don’t worry, we’re here to help, take 4 of us heroes on the adventure and charge our special powers to delay the inevitable doom.
